article.title: General Dynamics to Provide Ship Monitoring System
article.text: General Dynamics-Advanced Information Systems, Pittsfield, Mass., is being awarded a $10,485,397 cost-plus-incentive-fee modification to previously awarded contract (N00024-09-C-6206) for fiscal 2014 and 2015 multi-purpose processor cabinet and the Total Ship Monitoring System. The Naval Sea Systems Command, Washington, D.C., is the contracting activity.
